New Records: Trae Young hit a buzzer-beating 3-pointer from beyond the halfcourt line, a 49-foot shot, to give the Atlanta Hawks a 124-121 victory over the Utah Jazz.
Key Match Events: Trae Young hit a 49-foot buzzer-beating 3-pointer to win the game
Collin Sexton had seemingly forced overtime with a tying 3-pointer with four seconds remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game-winning shot was from beyond the halfcourt line.
The Atlanta Hawks celebrated a game-winning half-court shot against the Utah Jazz.
